sentence.Network_en: Emerson did well to emphasize the isolation of these people.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱默生着重说明这些人各自为政,这一见解可谓精辟.

sentence.Network_en: Newton Arvin has pointed out that Emerson had to struggle toward serenity.
sentence.Network_cn: 牛顿·阿尔文指出爱默生不得不奋力拼搏才得以达到清静境界.

sentence.Network_en: I saw that Emerson had even scrubbed the soles.
sentence.Network_cn: 我发现埃默森把鞋底都给擦干净了.
